 ðŸš€ Key Features

âœ¨ How It Works

1. Open AutoBot - Easily access AutoBot from your Chrome toolbar.
2. Set Your Preferences - Define your message templates, connection criteria, and follow-up schedule.
3. Launch & Automate - Start AutoBot to begin automated outreach with pre-set preferences. Sit back as the extension does the heavy lifting, allowing you to focus on the connections that matter.

 ðŸ”’ Privacy & Security

Make your LinkedIn outreach fast, efficient, and hassle-free with AutoBot. Install now and let automation work for you!
